value.name: labels
value.description: A list of labels that when detected will be sent to the post processor. Applies only to this specific camera.
Camera identifier. Valid characters are lowercase a-z, numbers and underscores.

value.name: cameras
value.description: Camera-specific configuration. All subordinate keys corresponds to the camera_identifier of a configured camera.

value.name: labels
value.description: A list of labels that when detected will be sent to the post processor. Applies to all cameras defined under cameras.

value.name: face_recognition_path
value.description: Path to folder which contains subdirectories with images for each face to track.

value.name: save_unknown_faces
value.description: If set to true, any unrecognized faces will be stored in the database, as well as having a snapshot saved. You can then move this image to the folder of the correct person to improve accuracy.

name.name: unknown_faces_path
name.value: Config option 'unknown_faces_path' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

value.description: Path to folder where unknown faces will be stored.

value.name: expire_after
value.description: Time in seconds before a detected face is no longer considered detected.

value.name: save_faces
value.description: If set to true, detected faces will be stored in the database, as well as having a snapshot saved.

value.name: model
value.description: Which face recognition model to run. See models for more information on this.
